New Records: This is the biggest upset by FIFA ranking differential in Euro history.
From a sports betting perspective, it was also historic.
Key Match Events: Slovakia struck with a seventh-minute goal by forward Ivan Schranz
The drama in Frankfurt came hours after Romania upended predictions by outclassing Ukraine 3-0 in Munich.
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium was ranked No. 3 in FIFA men's world rankings entering the match, while Slovakia was ranked No. 48.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium fell to a first loss in 15 games under coach Domenico Tedesco and faces Romania in the Saturday evening game in Cologne.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The odds of a draw closed at +340.
Others: Slovakia has more than one day to prepare for facing Ukraine in Duesseldorf on Friday.
